ygData.msgSnippet: I might use back my Kenven in innoruuk[though hes NAKED] However when RaceWar server up,I most prolly going there as the name Artemis,Human Rogue[so I muz
ygData.messageBody:
I might use back my Kenven in innoruuk[though hes NAKED]
However when RaceWar server up,I most prolly going there as the name
Artemis,Human Rogue[so I muz enter server once up to get name..kekeke]

ok everyobody contribute 30pp to kenven's Resurrection..HAHA!





Entreri

>Ok..that's it...when i lvl 12 tonite...me gonna brew until next morning!
>heehhehehehe
>I gotta spend around at least 40 pp or more on spells alone (not getting
>them all even) so i better start brewing!
>
>p.s Entreri they still lookin for Superman actor...since you so
fast...maybe
>you can beat Nicholas Cage
>and get the role.. LOL
>uh..and what's your EQ nick again? me will see if ya online next
time...want
>to add more to my friend's list
>leh..now only got ziltus who's from sg
>
>Zanderion (brewing once i reach lvl 12 magi)
